perturbation.original_text:
As used in this Agreement (including the recitals set forth above), the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below (each of which includes the singular and the plural):

"ACH" shall mean the electronic transfer of funds through an automated clearing house system.

"Affiliate" shall mean any entity that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party.

"Applicant" shall mean a Merchant who submits an Application.

"Application" shall mean the Merchant application used by ISO, as provided by and/or approved by SERVICERS and ISO, and other existing Merchant applications assigned to Bank as part of the initial BIN/ICA transfer.
perturbation.changed_text:
As used in this Agreement (including the recitals set forth above), the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below (each of which includes the singular and the plural):

"ACH" shall mean the electronic transfer of funds through an automated clearing house system.

"Affiliate" shall mean any entity that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party.

"Applicant" shall mean an Approved Merchant who submits an Application.

"Application" shall mean the Merchant application used by ISO, as provided by and/or approved by SERVICERS and ISO, and other existing Merchant applications assigned to Bank as part of the initial BIN/ICA transfer.
perturbation.explanation: In the definition of "Applicant", changing "a Merchant" to "an Approved Merchant" creates a circular reference and contradiction. An Applicant is defined as an Approved Merchant, but to become an Approved Merchant, one must first be an Applicant. This creates uncertainty as the terms are no longer clear.

perturbation.original_text:
"Merchant Account" shall mean the account relationship established between ISO, Bank and an Approved Merchant pursuant to a Merchant Processing Agreement.

"Merchant Discount Amount" shall mean the portion of the face amount of Bank Card transactions submitted by Approved Merchants and processed through the Program that is paid to SERVICERS. Further, this portion shall be determined by application of the Merchant Discount Rate that is reflected in each Merchant Processing Agreement.

"Merchant Discount Rate" shall mean a percentage rate to be applied to determine the portion of the face amount of a Bank Card transaction that will be charged to the originating Merchant, which rate shall be reflected in each Merchant Processing Agreement and subject to change from time to time pursuant to the terms of the Merchant Processing Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
"Merchant Account" shall mean the account relationship established between ISO, Bank and an Approved Merchant pursuant to a Merchant Processing Agreement.

"Merchant Discount Amount" shall mean the portion of the face amount of Bank Card transactions submitted by Merchants and processed through the Program that is paid to SERVICERS. Further, this portion shall be determined by application of the Merchant Discount Rate that is reflected in each Merchant Processing Agreement.

"Merchant Discount Rate" shall mean a percentage rate to be applied to determine the portion of the face amount of a Bank Card transaction that will be charged to the originating Merchant, which rate shall be reflected in each Merchant Processing Agreement and subject to change from time to time pursuant to the terms of the Merchant Processing Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: In the definition of "Merchant Discount Amount", changing "Approved Merchants" to "Merchants" creates a contradiction. Merchant Discount Amount is now applied to all Merchants when the contract specifies an approved merchant. It creates ambiguity as the term are no longer clear.

perturbation.original_text: ISO shall be responsible for ensuring that the Application Materials, the marketing plans, the Promotional Materials and all services performed by ISO hereunder comply, and remain in compliance with, all applicable Rules, laws and regulations; provided, however, that SERVICERS will in good faith inform ISO of issues or concerns with ISO's materials or practices observed by SERVICERS that SERVICERS reasonably believe may be in violation of applicable Rules. All documents and any changes to the form and content thereof must be approved in writing by SERVICERS prior to use by ISO, which approval will not be unreasonably withheld or delayed beyond fifteen (15) days.
perturbation.changed_text: ISO shall be responsible for ensuring that the Application Materials, the marketing plans, the Promotional Materials and all services performed by ISO hereunder comply, and remain in compliance with, all applicable Rules, laws and regulations; provided, however, that SERVICERS will in good faith inform ISO of issues or concerns with ISO's materials or practices observed by SERVICERS that SERVICERS reasonably believe may be in violation of applicable laws. All documents and any changes to the form and content thereof must be approved in writing by SERVICERS prior to use by ISO, which approval will not be unreasonably withheld or delayed beyond fifteen (15) days.
perturbation.explanation: By changing "applicable Rules" to "applicable laws", creates an ambiguity. It makes it unclear what rules the ISO needs to follow and enforces ISO to comply with laws that are not clearly defined.
